author: wn.com
title: Hilti again among best employers (Government of Principality of Liechtenstein)
text: ( Source : Government of Principality of Liechtenstein ) 14.10. 2015 Construction group Hilti has secured a top spot in the ' Great Place to Work ' world ranking for the third time in five years. The company from Liechtenstein has this year
